article_title: On foreign affairs, Trump inspires dread
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: I don’t think I have ever heard a more ridiculous reason to support a flawed candidate than that presented by Harry Goldin in his March 22 letter, “Like him or hate him, Trump is our nominee.” If Mr. Goldin honestly believes Trump is “radical, crude and unpresidential,” why is he urging people to support him? Please put politics aside and think of our country first, not a political party.I am less concerned about what Trump might do domestically.
